name: amkrtech
description: AMKRTech - Intelligent Financial Planning Tools and Calculators
author: AMKRTech Team

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install -w UI && npm install -w mid-tier
scripts.dev: concurrently -n mid-tier,ui --kill-others "npm run start:dev -w mid-tier" "npm run start -w UI"
scripts.build:all: npm run build -w mid-tier && npm run build -w UI
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint -w mid-tier && npm run lint -w UI
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean -w mid-tier && npm run clean -w UI
